FilterTemplate.Name: Priority Project Template
FilterTemplate.Description: Project Template for High Risk Projects

FolderDefinition.name: Critical
FolderDefinition.description: This folder provides a comprehensive list of issues in the application with a high impact and high likelihood.

FolderDefinition.name: High
FolderDefinition.description: This folder provides a comprehensive list of issues in the application with a high impact and low likelihood.

FolderDefinition.name: Medium
FolderDefinition.description: This folder provides a comprehensive list of issues in the application with a low impact and high likelihood.

FolderDefinition.name: Low
FolderDefinition.description: This folder provides a comprehensive list of issues in the application with a low impact and low likelihood.

TagDefinition.name: Analysis
TagDefinition.Description: The analysis tag must be set for an issue to be counted as 'Audited.' This is encouraged to be the final action performed by an auditor.

TagDefinition.name: FODStatus
TagDefinition.Description: The analysis tag must be set for an issue to be counted as 'Audited.' This is encouraged to be the final action performed by an auditor.

FilterSet.Title: Fortify On Demand
FilterSet.Description: This setting provides the source code analyzer with the most comprehensive set of rules. It should be used to discover a broad set of security issues to be audited. Fortify SCA assigns issues a severity level based on the potential impact the issue could have on the security of an application. The engine also assigns a confidence level to further prioritize issues of the same severity. This set of filters uses these two attributes in order to sort the issues into three folders: Hot, Warning, and Info.

Filter.query: audience:!fod AND analyzer:!pentest AND category:!cross-site request forgery category:!cookie security\: cookie not sent over ssl category:!cookie security\: session cookie not sent over ssl
